author: stas
msg: Prevent a problem where an autovivified package (stash) prevents from
modperl_mgv to load the file with that package (until now it was
checking whether the stash existed already and skipped the loading if
that was the case). Now checking %INC and attempting to load the
module. Reporting the failure only if the module has failed to load
and the stash is not defined (so that it's possible to autovivify
packages without loading them from an external file).

author: stas
msg: MaxClients is now overridable from the t/TEST -maxclients command line

author: stas
msg: sometimes when require fails we end up with key => undef, entry in

author: stas
msg: Postpone the allocation of the wbucket in filters till the moment it's
needed (if at all). Since non-streaming filters aren't going to use
that buffer, it's a waste to allocate/free it.

author: stas
msg: Extend the autogenerated bug report to include information about
installed modules of special interest (which may aid in understanding
the bug report), such as CGI.pm, Apache::Request, LWP, etc.
